entries.description: Add warning to indicate time delay in SQS queue deletion
Fixed issue with uncaught exception in resource cache (#3098)
Don't attempt to setup run configurations for test code (#3075)
Fix toolWindow not running in EDT
Handle Lambda pending states while updating function (#2984)
Fix modality issue when opening a CloudWatch log stream in editor (#2991)
Workaround regression with ARN console navigation in JSON files
Fix 'The project directory does not exist!' when creating SAM/Gradle projects when the Android plugin is also installed
An upcoming release will remove support for IDEs based on the 2021.1 platform
